title: Having A Depressing Experience with this game
body:
Other the course of my weekend I have somehow managed a 15 game lose streak  many of my "friends" or people I play with have told me to uninstall and just give up trying to get to gold I'm having a really depressing experience with the only game I "enjoy"
 {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Same dude, I dropped from plat 3 to plat 5 this weekend and now Iâ€™ve vowed to play less league because of it as this has made me really not enjoy the game as much
Theres more ARAMS than ranked in that match history... doesn't count.
:( my advice is to just take a break man, that's what I did and now I'm back going 37/2 :)
Stop playing those champs and start playing Warwick{{champion:19}} . Vi{{champion:254}}  for more fun
